verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarvannathuni chaatuna nivasinchedi Vaade sarva shakhtuni needanu Vishraminchunu parama Dhanyatha idiye Thana rekkalatho kappunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aayane naa aashrayamu Naa kotayu durgamunu Ayana satyamu naa kedemunu Ne nammu konu devudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pagati baanamu kainaa Raatri bhayamuna kainaa Cheekatilo thirugu thegulu kainaa Ne nemi bhayapadanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Veyi padivelu kudi Prakkanu koolinanu Daya choopu devudu nee kunda Apaayamu raadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee prabhu vaashrayame Yehovaa nivaasam Apaayamu thegulu Nee gudaaramu sameepinchavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needu maarghambu lalo Ninnu dootalu kaayun Paadamulaku raayi Thagula kunda ninnethu konduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kodama simhamula Naagu paamula nanachedavu Athadu naa naamamu Nerigenu athani thappinchedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Athadu nanu preminchen Naamamuna morapetten Athani vedipinchi ghana Parathun athani kuttara mithun{/lang-eng}
